hero.title: Portfolio Starter kit - Next.js & Tailwind & Contentlayer
hero.subTitle: Built with Next.js 13, React 18 and TypeScript
hero.description: My template is packed with all necessary logic to start the work - such as language changing, light/dark mode, contentlayer, cypress, tailwind among others. I chose to make this template with pages directory, since at this point of time it still has the best compatibility with most of the libraries out there. Feel free to refactor it to ‚Äúapp directory‚Äù if it is needed for your project. üôÇüöÄ
